title: Roast cod with a lemon, garlic and parsley crust
description: The delicate flavour of cod is wonderfully paired with lemon, garlic and parsley in this simple dish.This meal provides 322 kcal, 33g protein, 16g carbohydrate (of which 0.6g sugars), 14g fat (of which 8g saturates), 0.6g fibre and 0.9g salt per portion.
ingredients: 85g/3oz white breadcrumbs, soft or slightly stale
